name: Aurora
pages: The $(l)Aurora$() is a semi-automatic $(o)LightFrag$() weapon with a Split/Refract engine. In other words, a shotgun. It fires 7 lightfrags in a wide cone each shot. Very high damage if all pellets connect, but the lowest range of 10 m.

pages.text: This upgrade module comes pre-installed in the Aurora. Optimized for short-range brawls, Aurora's systems allow the user to step higher and move much faster.
